body.p: By default, the Synopsys Bridge Bridge writes logs and temporary files to <current_working_directory>/.bridge. You may change this default directory by using the --home <directory_path> option.

The following files and directories are found under the Synopsys Bridge home directory:
bridge.log
diagnostics.json file with --diagnostics option. See Logging and Diagnosticsfor details.
Adapter directories and the corresponding stdout and stderr log files.
Additional temporary files.
